comment.author: 61614891@N06
comment._content: I didn't actually take this photograph, but almost certainly bought it.

comment.author: 39827348@N05
comment._content: Air US also flew some Handley Page HP-137 Jestreams and even ordered a couple of the re-worked Grumman Gulfstream (Stretched) G-1Cs. However when Allegheny changed its name to USAir, to avoid confusion of names Air US was inclined to change their name to Excellair. After that, they promptly went out of business.
